name: Dhampir
description: The Dhampir blends the lineage of vampires with humans, featuring notable agility and charm, and carries a rapier or shortbow for combat.
memorable: Its ability to charm foes and regain health through necrotic attacks makes it a dangerous opponent.
goals: The Dhampir generally seeks to manipulate situations to its advantage, often engaging in combat, charm, or stealth.
relations: Dhampirs may be associated with undead creatures, vampires, or other humanoid beings.
environment: Typically found in urban areas or places with darker influences.
strengths: Possesses resistance to necrotic damage and advantages in Dexterity and Charisma-based checks.
weaknesses: Lower health pool makes it susceptible to attacks despite its agility.
attacks: Utilizes a rapier for close combat and a shortbow for ranged attacks, allowing for multiattacks and grappling.
most_powerful_ability: Dark Thirst allows the Dhampir to regain health by inflicting necrotic damage to incapacitated foes.
equipment: Rapier or shortbow may be used as weapons.
senses: Passive Perception of 10 indicates a standard awareness.
skills: Specializes in athletics, deception, persuasion, and stealth, excelling in tactical and social environments.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against disease due to Undead Resistance.
Can charm one humanoid at a time for social manipulation.
Multiattack capability allows for versatile combat options.
Regains health through necrotic damage inflicted with Dark Thirst.
